titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue temporary certificates of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for the vessels IDUN VIKING, LIV VIKING, and FREJA VIKING.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S12384)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator Hollings without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 671.

bill.summary: 8/23/1994--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue temporary certificates of documentation for three named vessels for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States.
